snippet: The actor Philip Seymour Hoffman was killed after using not only heroin but also cocaine, amphetamines and sedatives, the New York City medical examiner announced.
abstract: New York City medical examiner says actor Philip Seymour Hoffman was killed by poisonous mix of drugs that included not only heroin but also cocaine, amphetamines and sedatives.
lead_paragraph: The actor Philip Seymour Hoffman was killed after using not only heroin but also cocaine, amphetamines and sedatives, the New York City medical examiner announced.

headline.main: Hoffman Killed by Toxic Mix of Drugs, Official Concludes
headline.print_headline: Hoffman Killed by Toxic Mix of Drugs, Official Concludes

keywords.value: Office of the Chief Medical Examiner of the City of New York
